Articles.Content:
Finally, since i joined in 0.14, i have landed on the mun!

Nellie's crew-mates would approve (I launched her into orbit, shes the only one who made it.....)

Congratulations!

Nothing beats the very first time

I still need to land on the mun myself.

That said, I have launched things at solar escape velocity easily enough. Glory to the SRB gods!

Congratulations!

Nothing beats the very first time

I concur. Everyone's first landing on Mun is a crucial milestone--it opens your mind to the possibilities...well at least it works up your imagination LOL, and further skill is still required if you want to make it to other planets or moons. But yeah, definite milestone. Congratulations
Congratulations, and if the position of Kerbol and Kerbin in the background wasn't intended, what a great spot to land as well.
